data.title: How many kids does The Young and the Restless actress Christel Khalil have?
data.meta_description: IN June 2023, actress Christel Khalil revealed that she is pregnant.Now, fans want to know more about the soap star's family life and kids.How many ki
data.text:
IN June 2023, actress Christel Khalil revealed that she is pregnant.

Now, fans want to know more about the soap star's family life and kids.

How many kids does The Young and the Restless actress Christel Khalil have?

Christel Khalil has one child from a past relationship and is expecting her second with her fianc√©, Sam Restagno.

On Monday, June 19, 2023, the actress revealed her pregnancy via an Instagram post in which her baby bump is visible.

As Soap Opera Network reported, Khalil was in Monaco promoting The Young and the Restless and its 50th-anniversary celebration during the yearly Monte Carlo Television Festival when she shared the news.

She captioned the video montage: "That‚Äôs a wrap on Monaco! Thank you @festivaltvmonte_carlo for a great trip! Loved being there with this A team.

"Lots of laughs, blisters on our feet, and ate enough croissants to supply a bakery. See you next time ‚úåüèΩ."

Khalil has a 13-year-old son named Michael Caden who was born on April 17, 2010.

According to Soaps.com, Michael's father is Khalil's ex-husband, Stephen Hensley.

Who is Christel Khalil?

The TV star was born Christel Adnana Mina Khalil on November 30, 1987, in Los Angeles, California.

The 35-year-old American actress has been featured on CBS' The Young and the Restless for over two decades, having first joined the cast in July 2002.

As per her CBS Biography, Khalil left the television series in September 2005 before returning in November 2006.

She stars as the character Lily Winters, the daughter of Drucilla and Neil Winters.

As CBS states, in addition to The Young and the Restless, she has appeared in multiple TV shows and films, including:

We Need to Talk

White Like the Moon

Interview with the Assassin

Milo the Kid

Matilda

Dragonfury

W.I.T.C.H.

NCIS

2 Broke Girls

Malcolm in the Middle

That's So Raven

Khalil's Biography also notes that she has earned multiple awards throughout her successful career in the entertainment industry.

In 2012, the actress received her first Daytime Emmy Award for Outstanding Younger Actress in a Drama Series.

Khalil won her first NAACP Image Award for Outstanding Actress in a Daytime Drama in 2008.

In her free time, she enjoys singing, practicing yoga, horseback riding, and traveling, according to her Biography.

Who is Christel Khalil's fianc√©, Sam Restagno?

On April 10, 2022, Khalil announced via Instagram that she is engaged to her longtime boyfriend, Sam.

The post features three photos of the happy couple in which Khalil shows off her engagement ring, along with the caption: "A couple months ago I said yes to the love of my life. We hate taking pictures so thank you to our beautiful friends for finally making us!

"Thank you @indigolabyogi for being such an amazing photog. And thank you @srestagn for asking me to be your partner in life. I could not be happier to tether myself to you forever‚Ä¶.(and yes, dressing the same that day was a true accident üòÜ)."

According to Soaps In Depth, Sam is a Canadian businessman, and the pair have been dating since at least 2016.

Who is Christel Khalil's ex-husband, Stephen Hensley?

Khalil was married to Stephen Hensley from 2008 to 2011.

According to his IMDb page, Stephen is an actor who has been featured in multiple movies and TV shows, such as Dane Granger, Steve: Death Collector, Get Off My Land, God Don't Like Ugly, Wake the F*** Up, Porkchop 3D, and Porkchop II: Rise of the Rind.
